data.name: ListAction
desc: This struct contains information needed in the notifications of a XDynamicResultSet.

items.name: ActionInfo
lines: depending on the content of ListAction.ListActionType the ListAction.ActionInfo could contain additional information about the changes happened (see table above).

items.name: ListActionType
lines: specifies the kind of modification happened to all assigned rows.
The value of the other members of this struct depend on the value of this member:

items.name: Position
lines: The position where something has happened (index begins with 1 as usual with JDBC ).

Its value does not necessary indicate the new position in the new com.sun.star.sdbc.XResultSet, but a position while doing the changes step by step beginning with the old com.sun.star.sdbc.XResultSet.
